name: NPC
text: Watch out, the orcs are here. Use your light to see them before they can see you!

name: NPC
text: You can always just run forward. If you are lucky you will survive. Luck can also be a skill!

name: NPC
text: Do not try to approach them from behind, they have a good sense of smell and eyes on the back of their head.

name: NPC
text: Run my friend run! Good luck!
